comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content:
This photo seems to be almost a panorama with -

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/anmm_thecommons/8932859197/]

... but with different ships in the foreground.

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content:
I am fairly sure that is the ORIENT in the foreground (forewater?!). The two slightly-raked funnels, arrangement of ventilators, masts with spars and gaffs, and the white walls with portholes - all seem to match the ORIENT photo - 

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/anmm_thecommons/8725149344/in/set-72157633437562473/]

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] Feel another panorama coming on...? Let me check & see if Hungerford has any more Circular Quay shots up his sleeve...
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/anmm_thecommons] Yes!  Not quite a panorama, but you can see the intention - 

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/anmm_thecommons/8965016437/]

Doubly sure that is the ORIENT.
